institutions.name: Philippine Health Insurance Corporation
institutions.description: Government corporation responsible for implementing the National Health Insurance Program in the Philippines

forms.title: Claim Form 2
forms.officialTitle: Republic of the Philippines - PHILIPPINE HEALTH INSURANCE CORPORATION
forms.description: PhilHealth Claim Form for Health Care Institution information and patient confinement details

fields.label: This form may be reproduced and is NOT FOR SALE
PLEASE WRITE IN CAPITAL LETTERS AND CHECK THE APPROPRIATE BOXES.
This form together with other supporting documents should be filed within sixty (60) calendar days from date of discharge.
All information, fields and tick boxes required in this form are necessary. Claim forms with incomplete information shall not be processed.
FALSE/INCORRECT INFORMATION OR MISREPRESENTATION SHALL BE SUBJECT TO CRIMINAL, CIVIL OR ADMINISTRATIVE LIABILITIES.

sections.name: PART I - HEALTH CARE INSTITUTION (HCI) INFORMATION

fields.label: 1. PhilHealth Accreditation Number (PAN) of Health Care Institution:
1. Name of Patient:
fields.example: ex: DELA CRUZ JUAN JR SIPAG

fields.label: 2. Was patient referred by another Health Care Institution (HCI)?

yes.label: Name of referring Health Care Institution

fields.label: 7. Discharge Diagnosis/es (Use additional CF2 if necessary):

components.label: a. For the following repetitive procedures, check box that applies and enumerate the procedure/sessions dates [mm-dd-yyyy]:
c. For MCP Package (enumerate four dates [mm-dd-year] of pre-natal check-ups)

options.label: Non-separation of mother/baby for early breastfeeding initiation

components.label: For Newborn Screening, please attach NBS Filter Sticker here
g. For Outpatient HIV/AIDS Treatment Package

fields.label: 10. Accreditation Number/Name of Accredited Health Care Professional/Date Signed and Professional Fees/Charges (Use additional CF2 if necessary):

components.label: Name of Accredited Health Care Professional

options.label: No co-pay on top of PhilHealth Benefit
With co-pay on top of PhilHealth Benefit

sections.name: PART III - CERTIFICATION OF CONSUMPTION OF BENEFITS AND CONSENT TO ACCESS PATIENT RECORD/S
sections.instructions: NOTE: Member/Patient should sign only after the applicable charges have been filled-out

fields.label: A. CERTIFICATION OF CONSUMPTION OF BENEFITS:

options.label: PhilHealth benefit is enough to cover HCI and PF Charges. No purchase of drugs/medicines, supplies, diagnostics, and co-pay for professional fees by the member/patient.

The benefit of the member/patient was completely consumed prior to co-pay OR the benefit of the member/patient is not completely consumed BUT with purchases/expenses for drugs/medicines, supplies, diagnostics and others.

scenario_b.label: a.) The total co-pay for the following are:

components.label: Amount after Application of Discount (i.e., personal discount, Senior Citizen/PWD)
Total Professional Fees (for accredited and non-accredited professionals)

scenario_b.label: b.) Purchases/Expenses NOT included in the Health Care Institution Charges

components.label: Total cost of purchase/s for drugs/medicines and/or medical supplies bought by the patient/member within/outside the HCI during confinement
Total cost of diagnostic/laboratory examinations paid by the patient/member done within/outside the HCI during confinement

fields.label: B. CONSENT TO ACCESS PATIENT RECORD/S:

components.label: I hereby consent to the submission and examination of the patient's pertinent medical records for the purpose of verifying the veracity of this claim to effect efficient processing of benefit payment.

I hereby hold PhilHealth or any of its officers, employees and/or representatives free from any and all legal liabilities relative to the herein-mentioned consent which I have voluntarily and willingly given in connection with this claim for reimbursement before PhilHealth.
Signature Over Printed Name of Member/Patient/Authorized Representative
If patient/representative is unable to write, put right thumbmark. Patient/Representative should be assisted by an HCI representative.
Relationship of the representative to the member/patient:
Reason for signing on behalf of the member/patient:

sections.name: PART IV - CERTIFICATION OF HEALTH CARE INSTITUTION

fields.label: I certify that services rendered were recorded in the patient's chart and health care institution records and that the herein information given are true and correct.
Signature Over Printed Name of Authorized HCI Representative

hciInformation.condition: hci_building_street IS NOT EMPTY AND hci_city_municipality IS NOT EMPTY AND hci_province IS NOT EMPTY

patientInformation.rule: Patient name (last and first) is required
patientInformation.condition: patient_last_name IS NOT EMPTY AND patient_first_name IS NOT EMPTY

patientInformation.rule: Confinement dates and times are required
patientInformation.condition: date_admitted IS NOT EMPTY AND time_admitted IS NOT EMPTY AND date_discharged IS NOT EMPTY AND time_discharged IS NOT EMPTY

patientInformation.rule: At least one discharge diagnosis is required

filingDeadlines.rule: Claims must be filed within 60 days from discharge

specialPackages.tb_dots: Requires intensive and maintenance phase details

professionalRequirements: Accreditation number required for health care professionals
Signature and date required for each professional

contactInformation.address: Citystate Centre 709 Shaw Boulevard, Pasig City
